alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 1:05PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Emanuel, southeastern Washington, northern Johnson and southern Jefferson Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 105 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Downs to near Colemans Lake, and moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Louisville, Wrightsville, Wadley, Davisboro, Harrison, Bartow, Summertown, Riddleville, Kite, Downs, Donovan, Modoc, Blundale, Pringle, Three Points, Moxley, Dellwood, New Home and Colemans Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central Georgia.
